All Classes

Class Description
Action
Action enums to represent what was the last sucsessful action.
Actor
Actor class which represents an entity that may move.
ActorName
ActorName Enum class which lists the names of different actors
Bot
The Bot class which extends Actor and will move by itself using BotMannager.
BotMannager
The BotMannager class handles all other Actors thats not Chap ,and will update their movements based on its own nextLoaction method.
Canvas  
Chap
Chap class which extends Actor which is our main protagonist.
Chip
Chip class represents the chips that chap can collect in order to open the final game and progress to the next level.
Direction
Direction enums for representing the 4 directions
Door
Door class which can be opened with the corresponding color key.
Exit
The Exit class which represents a Exit on the map, when chap has stepped onto the exit the level should end.
GameController  
GameInfoModel  
GameInfoRenderer  
GameInfoRendererImpl  
GameInfoView  
GameStatus  
Gate
Gate class which represents a Locked door but it will only open when chap has collected all the chips.
Info
The Info class which extends the Tile class, it should act like a free tile but will also show a help message to the player when walked on
InventoryBag  
Key
Key class for creating the key Tile which can be picked up and unlocks certain doors based on variation.
Lava
The Lava class which extends Tile and will kill any actor that interacts with this tile, removing their reference from the board.
Location
Location class which represents a single grid in the game which consists of a Tile and an Actor class object.
Main  
Maze
Maze class which stores the current level information of the game
MazeAITest
Unit test for Bot AI interactions
MazeIntegrityTest
Unit test for the Maze packages integrity.
Menu  
Parser  
PersistenceValidTests  
RecordAndReplay
Class to record game play and replay it.
renderer
The rendering module is responsible for providing a simple 2D view of the maze, to be embedded in the application.
SaveGame
Save the current game states like map, inventory, level info and time.
Tile
Tile class representing a single tile thats in a location.
TileName
TileName Enum class which lists the names of different tiles
Variation
Variation Enum class which lists the variation of different colors
Wall
Wall class represents a Tile that cannot be moved on to.
